<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Uncanny Bombs](/Feats.aspx?ID=115) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 79 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Far Lobber](/Feats.aspx?ID=94)

</column>

---

You lob bombs unerringly, despite obstructions or distance. When you throw an alchemical item with the [bomb](/Traits.aspx?ID=21) trait, its range increment increases to 60 feet, you reduce any circumstance bonus to the target’s AC from cover by 1, and you automatically succeed at the flat check when targeting a concealed creature.
name: Uncanny Bombs
